last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: Six months after his wife Patricia goes missing, Keith Hall falls in love with a beautiful stranger. After a series of intimate meetings, he shares confidences that appear to reveal a terrible truth about Patricia's disappearance. But the relationship is not all it seems, and Keith finds himself in a psychological game of cat and mouse with the police, leading to a dramatic courtroom showdown.

name: The Confession
overview: When Patricia Hall vanishes from the small Yorkshire town of Pudsey, her husband Keith becomes a suspect, caught in a storm of rumour and suspicion. Only after a year, when Keith Hall falls in love with a beautiful stranger, does the terrible truth about his wifeâ€™s disappearance seem to emerge in a shocking series of twists and revelations.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When mother-of-two Patricia Hall disappears from a small Yorkshire town, her family make desperate appeals for her safe return. Police launch a major search operation but find nothing. As the hunt continues, her husband Keith becomes the prime suspect. But there is no evidence tying him to any crime. Then a mysterious woman appears, who may offer the key to finding out the truth.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Six months after his wife Patricia goes missing, Keith Hall falls in love with a beautiful stranger. After a series of intimate meetings, he shares confidences that appear to reveal a terrible truth about Patricia's disappearance. But the relationship is not all it seems, and Keith finds himself in a psychological game of cat and mouse with the police, leading to a dramatic courtroom showdown.
